code: import*as actionTypes from"../actions/actionTypes";var initState={msg:{},status:null,id:null};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.GET_ERROR:return{msg:action.payload.msg,status:action.payload.status,id:action.payload.id};case actionTypes.CLEAR_ERROR:return{msg:null,status:null,id:null};default:return state;}};export default reducer;
